summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating Epstein's presence in the office for a limited time. The email suggests a professional interaction between the two individuals, but lacks detailed context about the nature of their communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating he is in the office for another 40 minutes.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

connections.description: Epstein is communicating with Staley regarding his availability in the office, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley on June 25, 2009.
Epstein mentions he will be in the office for another 40 minutes.
The email is marked as confidential treatment requested by JPMorgan Chase.
